item.description:
6:30 pm to 7:00 pm: Light yoga stretches
7:00 pm to 7:15 pm: Breathing techniques
7:15 pm to 7:45 pm: Meditation
7:45 pm to 8:00 pm: Discussion and questions

8:30 pm: Snack

The Art of Living Connecticut chapter is part of the non-profit Art of Living Foundation. It's aim is to promote a stress-free, violence-free society, and achieve personal transformation. The foundation does spiritual development courses built around yoga, breathing techniques and meditation.
item.why: Learn simple, easy-to-use breathing techniques and meditation to relieve stress. Get a glimpse of the popular Art of Living course that has been taken by over 3 million people all over the world.
item.name: The science of breath; And The Art of Living
